name: Punch Kidd
description:
▶ What are people saying about "Punch Kidd"?◀

[5/5] "App is awesome and brings back memories." -AUS

[5/5] "I used to love the Mario and sonic games. I'm delighted to find an app that rivals their fun factor!" -U.K

[5/5] "surprisingly true to the original." -AUS

[5/5] "Brought back loads of childhood memories." -U.K

[5/5] "...controls that work better than expected!" -USA

[5/5] "The newest version of this game is totally cute and works perfectly." 5/5 -CA

[4/5] "…very good and once you get the hang of the controls easy" - NZ

"[The] controls are spot on!"

--------------------------------------------

Punch Kidd lets you re-live your favourite game as a kid, complete with frantic air punches, ghostly enemies and miracle puzzles. Master a world of 16 epic, challenging and diverse levels. Blocky pixel-art and chirpy chiptune soundtracks of 80's consoles will bring this world to life - in your hand, all running natively and fullscreen on iPhone, iPad or iPod Touch!

Punch Kidd respects your time and will never interrupt you with annoying notifications asking you to play it.

Punch Kidd contains absolutely NO ADS or popups - just pure fun on your terms.

Hope you all love it :-)

Notify me of any suggestions and/or bugs on Twitter @timtupman.
